You need to connect removable storage first

"Mi Router App User Experience Program
Xiaomi Inc. (Xiaomi) invite you to take part in our User Experience Program (the Program). If you choose participate, data and usage statistics for Mi Router app will be sent to Xiaomi so that we can better understand how this product is being used.
We don't collect any personally identifiable information or user data (contacts, call history, etc.) as a part of the Program. We collect statistics about how (and how often) you use Mi Router's various features.
1. Opting in or out You can opt in or out of the Program anytime in Settings.
2. Purpose of this Program We aggregate your data and usage statistics into anonymous statistics to help us learn more about how Mi Router is being used and improve overall stability and quality. More specifically, we use this info for the following: 1. Pushing new updates and repairing bugs as quickly as possible. 2. Optimizing router performance for different types of connections (e.g. ADSL, Optical fiber). 3. Making sure the Mi Router is compatible with as many different types of devices as possible 4. Improving connectivity and features for Mi devices. 5. Provide anonymous data usage statistics for plug-in developers for Mi Router.
3. Updates to the Program We're always changing and improving our products, we may also make changes to the Program. If we do, we'll notify you via a notification in the Mi Router app.
Xiaomi Inc. "
Help Xiaomi improve this product by sending us data and usage statistics. [Learn more]
To play this video format install XunLei Player
